li.a: Bus Routes & Meet Our Bus Drivers

i.font: Click on school below to open individual school websites.

p.span: I'm sure you heard on the news that Commissioner of Education, Pender Makin, issued a communication last evening that included a recommendation--supported by Governor Mills--that Maine schools remain in a remote learning mode for the remainder of the school year. The hope, albeit fleeting, that we may return to classroom-based instruction by re-opening our schools in May, is all but dashed.

div.span: It is difficult for me to formalize the announcement that we will not be re-opening our Kittery schools before the end of the current school year...CLICK link below to read entire April 9th letter from Eric Waddell.

b.font: PLEASE NOTE CHANGE TO FREE MEALS!!

span.font: Important information for COVID patients and families who can not get to a pick up site:

b.font: Please email Wendy Collins, School Nutrition Director if you need a drop off:

i.font: If you have already signed up for a drop off you will still receive it.

div.div: Click Here for full FY21 Budget Schedule

Please call the Horace Mitchell Primary School at 439-1707 to schedule an appointment with the school secretary. You may download registration materials from our Mitchell Primary School website, or pick them up at the school.
Dates: May 15th, May 29th
If you have further questions about our registration, please call Principal Alli Gamache at 439-1707.

b.a: CLICK HERE FOR ~ QUICK TIP LINK

ONLY IF YOU ARE UNWILLING TO TELEPHONE OR E-MAIL

b.a: CLICK HERE for FREE SafeStop Bus Locator Service

div.span: SafeStop bus locator service shows parents and school administrators where the school bus is along its route, while the expected arrival times are displayed for each bus stop.

font.b: Superintendent of Schools: Eric F. Waddell
